name: Escape From Lucky Woods
description:
A game about escaping the woods as a little mushroom

Made For Mini Jam 95.

Jam Page: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-95-chance

Avoid birds, buzzsaws, and fire, as you try to find the path out of the woods, be hasty though, as you don't have much time.

4 Achievements to collect!
